mdRecord.dcterms:title: Photograph of DRIVE members visiting Congressman Moore in his office
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Congressman Arch A. Moore, Jr. with a group of DRIVE members in his office. Repeal of 14(b) was the subject of discussion when DRIVE ladies visited their legislators during a recent motorcade in Washington, D.C. Left to right: Jane Hall, Freda Martino, Martha Tucker, Agnes Evans (seated), Vierdeen Landhom, and Congressman Arch A. Moore, Jr.
